Comment: Unfortunately, we have seen this scenario play out many times in history in other countries, where people become enamored with a personality and fail to recognize the evil operating behind it. Some, like DJT, Chavez, Putin, put up a facade of protecting us from domestic and foreign enemies, while operating a mafia-like money-making machine behind the scenes. And just like in Venezuela and Russia, politicians who disagree in the US are afraid to speak out for fear of being targeted, both politically and physically. Probably the weakest link in our society right now is an activist majority on the SCOTUS. That could outlive the current evil running the WH and the majorities in Congress.  DJT's greed is far greater than his intelligence. There are some pretty evil people directing his political policies and operating his informal financial operations. It's hard to say whether someone will be capable of filling the void once he fades out. Clearly Vance does not have the personality to command the same popular following. We're already seeing some previously very liberal Dems start to move towards the center to try to gain more Independents, such as Newsome and Whitmere.
